name: Terry Hunt
text: Very good pizza.  Went for a late lunch and almost had the place to ourselves.  Ate outside and enjoyed the pretty day while the weather was nice.

name: Rachel Martin
text: We always enjoy eating here. The Holy Shitake Pie is delicious. One of our favorites. Mixed drinks are a little pricey but they have a fun selection. We love the decor with the Bus inside. Mice area to eat outside but the traffic can be noisy so we usually eat inside. Overall a good time.

name: Sylvia Kelley
text: One of my favorite places to eat at, the service is amazing, pizza is delicious and there‚Äôs a great variety of beers on draft! The manager, Erik always ensures everything is of standards and is delightful to speak with. I feel completely ‚Ä¶More

name: Tiana Thompson
text: I went to meet a friend here prior to standing a show. We wanted something we could share as we didn't want left overs or have to water food. We ordered salads & shared a veggie calzone. It was more than enough. Service was good, it didn't take long to get our food & it was an overall good experience.

name: Haleigh Solochier
text: I came here for my 20th birthday last month and just want to rave about my Hawaiian pizza. It was delicious! The crust was yummy and not burnt at all. The sauce, the cheese and the toppings were all so good. My family got calzones and loved ‚Ä¶More

name: Hunter Joyner
text: Easily the best of the three mellow mushrooms in Charlotte. So far it also holds the top spot of all restaurants I have tried since moving to Charlotte.  The customer service is top notch.

name: nina Peterson
text: Love love the pizza n the atmosphere.  Best pizza ever

name: Henry Navarrete
text: I have to the veggie pizza vegan so sexy delicious wet clean Ingredients

name: Unknown
text: The worst mellow mushroom I have ever visited. Staff is rude and condescending. Pizza had hardly any toppings and the crust was smashed paper thin. Will never return here again.

name: Temple Thomas
text: Their service was a little bit slow although I do know that they cook everything to order. Decent wine selection. Our pizza was good , Crust could have been a little bit crispier overall probably close to four stars. However two friends ‚Ä¶More

name: William Mayberry
text: Generally a great place and  today we visit often, but I was disappointed to hear today that they had decided to close early.  When I asked another question for future reference, they said they always stop taking orders before they close. ‚Ä¶More

name: C C Hill
text: Normally one of my favorite spots. Today had order issues and underseasoned food.

name: Heather Balbi
text: Been to a few Mellow Mushrooms. This one was really neat with the bus you could sit at inside. We came on a sunda where there was only 1 server for a little bit so it took some time to get serve but we were understanding. Wings were good, ‚Ä¶More

name: Vincent Martin
text: Always good pizza. Love the decorations which is their trademark.    We didnt have a wait to be seated which was very nice.

name: Donna Clay
text: The interior of this place is amazing and the staff was so friendly and helpful.

name: Brittany Cross
text: Super friendly , alcohol drinks are the best , I recommend the Undead mix drink myself has a few different types of alcohol but you can't tell when drinking it until it hits you lol. Oven baked wings and pizza was so yummy too. We built our pizza and it was so fresh and took no time to get our food!!

name: Clayton Russell
text: My favorite pizza place. Every time I come back to the USA, I have to eat at Mellow Mushroom. Atmosphere was nice, laid back and service was good. Holiday season so maybe not a typical night but perfect to just relax. Pizza as always is good and the soup d jour was  nice on a cold evening.

name: Daniel Branham
text: we were there pretty late, but the service was still good and the food still hot. we got pretzels with beer cheese and, for some reason, the cheese tasted like banana taffy. wasn't the best. ‚Ä¶More

name: Nicholas Gibson
text: Pretty standard Mellow Mushroom. Great food, drinks, and good service. Simply amazing. Great ingredients with superb pizza.

name: Kate Kennedy
text: I love this place. Always a nice calm atmosphere. Great pizza! From what I can see now it looks a little different, but I‚Äôm sure tastes the same.

name: KaTrina Blackwell
text: The food was good .  The service was great!! There's a bus... and you can sit in it!!

name: Nate Jordan
text: I love coming here but my take-out order today was definitely not up to usual. My pie was completely burned on the bottom. Disappointing

name: Chris Smith
text: Great staff love this location easy to park over uptown location.

name: Smiley Dalmida
text: My first time here and I was AMAZED. A very friendly place to sit and eat. The staff was Very nice and funny. I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND

name: Courtney Driscoll
text: Love mellow mushroom but this location is our favorite! Best pizza I‚Äôve had since I moved to Charlotte! And the staff is outstanding.. especially Lily she‚Äôs so sweet and helpful! The perfect way to end a long week with all our friends!

name: Sharon Spencer
text: The Thai Dye pizza is so delicious

name: Diwakar Viswanathan
text:
Ambience - not bad. The place is not very clean and it could have been better.
There is a bus kind of setup which certainly attracts the kids !
The pizzas and the sides are good and tasty! Friendly staff ! Not expensive and a good value for money place !

name: King R3D
text: Holly  Shiitake pie!!! I love mellow mushroom best pies around. Friendly staff. Quick service per pickup. Interesting things to look at. definitely keep you wondering!

name: Jennifer Bradley
text: Great food, great area!

name: S W
text: Friendly and clean. Fast and fresh.

name: Susan Joyner
text: So much yummy food

name: Grant Carney
text: When I was a wee lad I used to shove my face full of pretzels covered in cinnamon sugar then drizzled in honey. Waltzed up to mellow on Selwyn and did not see this item on the menu...so I asked...and they made the pretzels to my exact specifications. Amazing stroll down memory lane.

name: Valentina Cherednichenko
text: Got a carry out order and sat at the bar while it was being made. Overall, lovely staff, great food, fast service.

name: Toby John Grear
text: Great Pizza and Great vibe. Eric the Manager came to my table and personally asked my how my day and experience was.  Hand-tossed pizza by some very entertaining chefs.

name: Alex Iseman
text: Came on a trivia night, had a blast. Good service, good trivia, good beer, what more could you ask for?!

name: Brian Leech
text: Great pizza, great place! Been a Charlotte staple for a very long time. Try the great white with pesto chicken! Or just a cheese pizza. Online ordering makes me pick mellow over a big chain every time

name: Amanda Settewongse
text: Want the best pizza and great service with a fun and bright atmosphere? Mellow üçÑ is your place. Love the Kosmic Karma and the Holy Shiitake Pizzas!

name: Cameron Martin
text: Love this place, staff is super friendly and our waitress was always happy to help. The food is always fresh.

name: Amanda Hooks
text: The atmosphere is always great, so fun and family friendly. Our favorite family restaurant.

name: Cathy Clark
text: great options for pizza, beer, salads and easy to customize your toppings and crust. Easy going neighborhood  environment, friendly service and booths for two or larger groups, tvs to catch the games and parking steps from the door. Look for it off Selwyn and enjoy the treetop Christmas decorations off Hillcrest afterwards

name: Allison Warner
text: Food was good! Waitress seemed a bit awkward the entire time.

name: GM1 Bailey
text: Clean place but I'm not a fan of the crust

text: Very friendly place in a quiet neighborhood. Decoration is very attractive and they have a school bus inside where people can sit.

name: Philip Tate
text: Love the dough at Mellow Mushroom. The Mighty Meaty is my favorite.

name: Christopher Reeves
text: Great atmosphere and food.

name: Rhett Michael
text: Best place for a 6 year olds birthday party ever.

text: Great Food! Beats any pizza place around here. The staff and Managers are awesome as well.

name: Jessica Parker
text: Went in tonight for a quick bite and had Mike as our server. He was great! Super friendly and on top of our every need. The pizza we ordered was taking just a little longer than expected (by no means slow or a long wait at all, we were just ‚Ä¶More

name: Jaysen Gardner
text: Really good food for the price. Amazing pizza, burgers, and calzones. Normally I'm not a carb heavy person but I'd lose it all for some Mellow Mushroom.

name: SD Boone
text: I love this place!! Great food and wonderful staff. The managers are especially excellent. I will be back. I promise!!

name: Naomi Shibles
text: I just had my son‚Äôs 6th birthday party in the Magic Bus at the Mellow Mushroom on Selwyn Avenue and it was fabulous! The staff were flawless and the manager, Jessica Peninger, was a delight to work with. It was perfect.

name: Angie Solis
text: Food not so great here

name: Daniel Suthers
text:
The old MM Lunch special can‚Äôt be beat.

Two slices and a drink for $6. Check please!

name: jkn4JESUS
text: Meh! $5 (personal pizza) Tuesdays makes it worth it and they have a neat eating area made from shell of a school bus. Staff pretty chill and accommodating. Wouldn't recommend the wingsüòù

name: Paul Currie
text: Dang, potentially the best pizza I've had. In fact a friend from across the pond still talks about this pizza. He was here more than 2.5 years ago. Service is quick, taste is delicious. Get on it.

name: Megan Ritchie
text: Simply amazing. Great ingredients with superb pizza. Best pizza I have ever had. Period. Only problem is, I wish there was one closer to my home!  Not to mention, our waitress, was on point. Perfect service. Thank you Mellow Mushroom!

name: David Gammage
text: Great pizza and service with a good beer selection. Would give it 5 stars but their prices are a little high for pizza. Other than that it's great!

name: shravani sharma
text: Great pizza. Took some quality to prepare the delicious pizza of your choice with a magical touch of mellow mushroom

name: dakito fey
text: wonderful food, quick service and friendly staff. overall great dining experience.

name: Unique Lalique4ever
text: Mellow Mushroom is the Truth! Bon Appetite! The boys from Carolina Christian Academy were hungry.

name: Anthony Epps
text: Love this place...great food and great services

name: Khadijah Jackson
text: I ordered from here through postmates today for the first time and the pizza was delicious. I got the lunch special that comes with 2 slices of pizza and a drink for $6 which is a great deal. The pizza slices were huge and very tasty. I will definitely be ordering again.

name: Jessica Freeman
text: We always have a phenomenal experience at Mellow Mushroom!!!! The staff is friendly and attentive and the food is divine! It's no longer on the menu, but the Magical Mystery Tour is delicious and they will still make it for you.

name: Eric Caruolo
text: Relaxed atmosphere, amazing food, friendly service. Best pizza in Charlotte.

name: Cindy Trobaugh
text: Great pizza but toppings need to be spread closer to edges and not just in the center...too much crust...not enough toppings.

text: Was good not great.  Glad they had juicy jay on tap.  Server was nice.

name: Jeffrey Small

text: consistently get my to go orders incorrect and I am consistently waiting longer than the time quoted for my order to be ready. I won‚Äôt be going back to this location.

Selwyn Avenue

text: We started going to Mellow for 'date night' when my wife worked out of town during the week. When that came to an end, Friday night date night as Mellow remained. Still one of our faves, although I miss the 'local' faves, like the pizza that had the beer cheese on it. WAS FANTASTIC.

text: Horrible customer service. I will not be spending my money here again. My husband ordered a pizza with pepperoni on half. When he told the lady it was wrong she blamed it on him. Then said they would fix it, but who wants to wait another 30 minutes while the other pizza is getting cold? Ridiculous!

name: Rene Acuna
text: Kim Starnes was our server and she Did  a Fabulous job. Great Service food and drinks! Thanks Kim for your hospitality!!

Depends on your server!
